node.title: Police search old mining site for bodies of allegedly murdered campers Russell Hill and Carol Clay
node.alt: A row of four-wheel drives with trailers move along a gravel track bordered by dense bushland.
node.description: The head of the Victoria Police Missing Persons Squad has arrived at a remote area of bushland to help search for the remains of the missing campers.
node.content:
["The head of the Victoria Police Missing Persons Squad has arrived at a remote area of bushland in the state's high country to help search for the remains of missing campers Carol Clay and Russell Hill.", "Car loads of extra\u00a0police today joined a small contingent who had spent the weekend guarding an\u00a0area near the old gold mining town\u00a0of Grant, north-west of Dargo.", "Those who joined today included\u00a0officers from the search and rescue and major crime scene units, as well as Inspector Andrew Stamper, who heads up the Missing Persons Squad.", "A campsite in the area has become\u00a0the latest focus in\u00a0a search for the pair's remains, since police first started scouring the area last week.", "", "
The search site is near Grant, a historic gold mining town.(ABC News: Patrick Rocca)
", "Ms Clay and Mr Hill disappeared in\u00a0March 2020 when camping in\u00a0the remote bushland of the Wonnangatta Valley.", "Caroline Springs man\u00a0Gregory Stewart Lynn\u00a0was arrested last week and charged with two counts of murder relating to the\u00a0missing pair.", "He has been remanded in custody until a court hearing scheduled for May next year, and is yet to enter a plea.", "Police also seized the 55-year-old's beige four-wheel-drive\u00a0Nissan Patrol, which was the same model vehicle detectives were searching for earlier this month.", "", "
Forensic police and the Missing Persons Squad resume their search for the missing campers near Dargo.\u00a0(ABC News: Patrick Rocca)
", "Officers were seen on Monday\u00a0afternoon towing an all-terrain buggy out to the search site.", "Wet weather is believed to have hindered search for the bodies over the weekend.", "But\u00a0East Gippsland and Wellington police Inspector Matt Gleeson said clear and dry weather should\u00a0have assisted officers in their search efforts on Monday.", "\"We have set up a crime scene up in Dargo in the great alpine area, so we were dependent on the weather,\" he said.", "\"These are very remote locations and we will throw every resource we can into it.\"", "Grant is a popular camping ground for four-wheel drivers.\u00a0", "Camper Steve West said\u00a0authorities had\u00a0advised him of a police incident in the area after he arrived on Thursday.", "He was told he did not have to leave but not to\u00a0\"use the track as a highway\" and to \"only go in and out when you have to\"."]
